item.title: Dalit house surgeon ends life; colleague held for cheating in Siddipet
item.description:
<![CDATA[Dalit house surgeon ends life; colleague held for cheating in Siddipet
A 23-year-old house surgeon from Jogulamba-Gadwal district died by suicide in Siddipet after being allegedly cheated by a fellow doctor who refused to marry her citing caste. Police have arrested the accused and booked him under SC/ST Act
By Telangana Today Updated On - 5 January 2026, 09:27 PM
B Lavanya from Jallapuram village of Jogulamba-Gadwal district died by suicide.
Siddipet: Reportedly cheated by a fellow doctor i...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
